TopicTitle: Mods that replicate real life rocket parts?

Articles.Content: Okay, so I plan to replicate /u/Mendahu Ksphistory.com missions in real solar system. I'm going to research the parts and use their exact specifications using procedural tanks and real fuels. The problem, as I was replicating the V2 rocket I couldn't find an engine that fit my exact specifications, so I was wondering, what mods replicate historical rocket parts. I looked at the realism overhaul page, but I'm not interested in non historical rocket engines, and I am sure there are some historical mods that the RO page is missing

Taerobee has the A-4 parts.

FASA and Saab's Historical Pack have early through 70s US parts.

Raidernick's various rocket mods have Soviet parts.

Really, just look into Realism Overhaul, and the mods we suggest--some are 'generic' partmods, like KW Rocketry, but some are real-part partmods.
